name: UNDEAD FACTORY:
detailed_description:
Zombie roam the earth, this living hell.
Is it even worth surviving this desperate world?

There is only one rule. Plunder or be plundered.
Even if you achieve survival, can that even be called a victory? Or is it just the beginning of the end?...

■Generate zombie,Cause pandemic!
Even using zombie themselves, you must do whatever you can to survive.

■Gather survivors.
they may appear weak, but even they can be used for certain important purposes.

■Rebuild Civilization
If you choose to live your life, enclose your colony with a strong walls. Do not give in to zombie invasions.

■Join a guild
It is tough to survive alone in this desperate world. With allies however, that probability increases.

■Use defenders tactically
Reduce the zombie that invade your colony to chunks of meat.


＜Undead Factory Game Features＞

- Post-apocalyptic setting strategy game
- Free-to-play Online RTS zombie game free
- Strategy featuring mass zombie infection
- A "Contagion system" that cause zombie pandemic
- Develop unique zombie units

short_description:
Survive zombie apocalypse!
Plunder resources for survival!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / vista / 7
  • Processor: Pentium III 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: shader model 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
